altername_name: Cyborg Kuro-chan 2: White Woods no Gyakushū
name: Cyborg Kuro-chan 2: White Woods no Gyakushuu
overview: Cyborg Kuro-chan 2: White Woods no Gyakushuu is a shooter. You play as Kuro the housecat and mainly control his crosshair, while trying to shoot the enemies you encounter. The levels scroll automatically.
